about_the_game:
Featuring unique animated effects, the Ultimate Flyer Pack includes several highly detailed and eyecatching looks for Tupandactylus and Pteranodon!

Previously only available as ultra-rare drops, these eyecatching skins are now bundled together for the first time along with their accompanying strange particle effects...

Centigrade:
Burning with rage, these dinosaurs have glowing hot magma coursing through their veins!

Cold Fusion:
Species exposed to cherenkov radition, with a ghostly blue glow emanating from within.

Kilowatt:
Pulsing with electricity, energy radiates throughout their bodies.

Thalassic:
Infused with bioluminescent characteristics, intricate patterns illuminate their skin.

For those who have absolutely no need for camouflage on the battlefield, blaze through the skies with an array of spectacular patterns and effects!

short_description: Is that lightning in the clouds? No, it's you! You're lightning! The Ultimate Flyer DLC - an array of bold animated looks for your pterosaurs!
